mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CNT, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{cnt}, #{memberId}, #{productId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT c.CNT, c.MEMBER_ID, c.PRODUCT_ID, p.NAME, p.PRICE, p.MAIN_IMG_URL FROM CART c JOIN PRODUCT p ON c.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID WHERE c.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and c.DELETE_YN = 'N'
